attributes.action: Provide a Discount on Fuel Duty to Staff Who Work in Critical Industries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Provide a Discount on Fuel Duty to Staff Who Work in Critical Industries.

Staff who work in critical industries such as:
All Transport industries
NHS
Armed Forces
etc.

People like myself spend a small fortune on petrol getting to and from work each day, i myself spend over £200 a month travelling the 30 miles to and from work, therefor I ask for a review into providing a discount on Fuel Duty for those who work in industries critical to the UK's finances.
